title: Don't Get Me Wrong
lyrics: tone Don't get me wrong I've played my part and it's over I'm tired of being strong The hiding that I'm not, yeah Don't get me wrong You've played your part and I think you know This love's for real It's time to show just how I feel Time after time I refuse to see why I can't go on without you by my side Baby, I just wanted you to know That if you can you could be part of my life Baby don't you know we could be doing this forever And we'll do it alright Time after time this moment's been on my mind Now I've left it behind Oh, don't get me wrong  Yeah, don't get me wrong You bruise my heart and it's aching It won't take it long to see that I'm in pain Don't get me wrong If you run-off now you sure be mistaken This love's for real And baby this is how I feel Time after time I've been trying to deny I can't go on without you by my side (Just don't get me wrong) Baby, I just wanted you to know That if you can you could be part of my life Baby don't you know we could be doing this forever And we'll do it alright Time after time this moment's been on my mind Now I've left it behind Just don't get me wrong mmm hmm Don't get me wrong No, no baby, oh yeah Time after time I've been trying to deny I need the nearness of your goodbye (Don't get me wrong) Baby, I just wanted you to know That if you can you could be part of my life Baby don't you know we could be doing this forever And we'll do it alright Time after time this moment's been on my mind Now I've left it behind Oh, don't get me wrong Baby, I just wanted you to know That if you can you could be part of my life Baby don't you know we could be doing this forever And we'll do it alright Time after time this moment's been on my mind Now I've left it behind Oh, don't get me wrong
